alert.note: Alert for Orofino, Grangeville Region; Southern Clearwater Mountains (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 27 at 6:28PM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Idaho County through 615 PM PDT... At 526 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Lowell, or 16 miles east of Kamiah. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Visibility one-half mile or less due to heavy rainfall. Ponding of water on Highway 12 is possible. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Low visibility could result in difficult driving conditions along Highway 12 from Lowell to Syringa. Locations impacted include... Lowell and Syringa. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Orofino, Grangeville Region; Southern Clearwater Mountains
